paperdoll.menu.title: Paper Doll Config Menu
paperdoll.menu.config.x.tooltip: Horizontal offset that the paperdoll should render
paperdoll.menu.config.y.tooltip: Vertical offset that the paperdoll should render
paperdoll.menu.config.fpOnly.tooltip: Render only when in First Person
paperdoll.menu.config.alwaysOn.tooltip: Render ALWAYS instead of only when doing special actions
paperdoll.menu.config.delay.tooltip: Delay to hide the paperdoll when rendering set to only special actions
paperdoll.menu.config.debugRender.toolti: Render the paperdoll when the debug screen is open
